          <title>
            <string language="en">Electronic thermostat</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Elektronischer Thermostat</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Thermostat électronique</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Termostato eletrônico</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Termostato elettronico</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ηλεκτρονική θερμοστάτης</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Termóstato electrónico</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Second of three diagrams demonstrating the use of logic gates in electronic control systems. The electronic thermostat system makes use of an OR gate.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">AND gates</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Circuits</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">electronic control systems</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">electronic thermostat</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Heaters</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">logic gates</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">temperature sensors</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">An zweiter Stelle von drei Diagrammen, die den 
Gebrauch von Logikgattern in den elektronisches Steuersystemen zeigen.
Das elektronische Thermostatsystem gebraucht ODER Gatter.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">En second lieu de trois diagrammes démontrant 
l'utilisation des portes de logique dans des systèmes de commande 
électronique. Le système électronique de thermostat se sert 
de l'OU de la porte.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Em segundo de três diagramas que demonstram o uso
de portas da lógica em sistemas de controle eletrônico. O 
sistema eletrônico do termostato emprega OU a porta.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">In secondo luogo di tre schemi che dimostrano 
l'uso dei cancelli di logica nei sistemi di controllo elettronici. 
Il sistema elettronico del termostato usa O il cancello.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δεύτερο τριών διαγραμμάτων που καταδεικνύουν τη χρήση
των πυλών λογικής στα ηλεκτρονικά συστήματα ελέγχου. Το 
ηλεκτρονικό σύστημα θερμοστατών χρησιμοποιεί Η την πύλη.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">En segundo lugar de tres diagramas que demuestran
el uso de las puertas de la lógica en sistemas de control 
electrónico. El sistema electrónico del termóstato hace uso O
la puerta.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">UND Gatter</string>
          </keyword>

            <string language="x-mt-de">Stromkreise</string>
          </keyword>
